CmdLine: echo "===> Installing sudo to emulate normal OS behavior..."  &&     apk --update add sudo                                         &&             echo "===> Adding Python runtime..."  &&     apk --update add python py-pip openssl ca-certificates    &&     apk --update add --virtual build-dependencies                 python-dev libffi-dev openssl-dev build-base  &&     pip install --upgrade pip cffi                            &&             echo "===> Installing Ansible..."  &&     pip install ansible==1.9.4         &&             echo "===> Removing package list..."  &&     apk del build-dependencies            &&     rm -rf /var/cache/apk/*               &&             echo "===> Adding hosts for convenience..."  &&     mkdir -p /etc/ansible                        &&     echo 'localhost' > /etc/ansible/hosts
Commands.Name: run

Commands.Expression: RUN                echo "===> Diagnosis: host information..."  &&               ansible -c local -m setup all
Commands.Name: onbuild
